mutants.code:
import hashlib
import binascii

def to_private_key(mnemonic: str) -> str:
    mnemonic_bytes = mnemonic.encode('utf-8')
    salt = b'mnemonic' - mnemonic_bytes
    seed = hashlib.pbkdf2_hmac('sha512', mnemonic_bytes, salt, 2048)
    private_key = seed[:32]
    return binascii.hexlify(private_key).decode('utf-8')

import hashlib
import binascii

def to_private_key(mnemonic: str) -> str:
    mnemonic_bytes = mnemonic.encode('utf-8')
    salt = b'mnemonic' * mnemonic_bytes
    seed = hashlib.pbkdf2_hmac('sha512', mnemonic_bytes, salt, 2048)
    private_key = seed[:32]
    return binascii.hexlify(private_key).decode('utf-8')

import hashlib
import binascii

def to_private_key(mnemonic: str) -> str:
    mnemonic_bytes = mnemonic.encode('')
    salt = b'mnemonic' + mnemonic_bytes
    seed = hashlib.pbkdf2_hmac('sha512', mnemonic_bytes, salt, 2048)
    private_key = seed[:32]
    return binascii.hexlify(private_key).decode('utf-8')

    private_key = seed[:32]
    return binascii.hexlify(private_key).decode('utf-8')

import hashlib
import binascii

def to_private_key(mnemonic: str) -> str:
    mnemonic_bytes = mnemonic.encode('utf-8')
    salt = b'mnemonic' + mnemonic_bytes
    seed = hashlib.pbkdf2_hmac('sha512', mnemonic_bytes, salt, -2048)
    private_key = seed[:32]
    return binascii.hexlify(private_key).decode('utf-8')

import hashlib
import binascii

def to_private_key(mnemonic: str) -> str:
    mnemonic_bytes = mnemonic.encode('utf-8')
    salt = b'mnemonic' + mnemonic_bytes
    seed = hashlib.pbkdf2_hmac('sha512', mnemonic_bytes, salt, 2048)
    private_key = seed[:32]
    return binascii.hexlify(private_key).decode('')

mutants.code:
import hashlib
import binascii

def to_private_key(mnemonic: str) -> str:
    mnemonic_bytes = mnemonic.encode('utf-8')
    salt = b'mnemonic' + mnemonic_bytes
    seed = hashlib.pbkdf2_hmac('sha512', mnemonic_bytes, salt, 2048)
    private_key = seed[:-32]
    return binascii.hexlify(private_key).decode('utf-8')
